构造方法详细信息

SimpleHttpClient

public SimpleHttpClient()
方法详细信息

setExecutorService

public void setExecutorService(@NotNull
                               ExecutorService executorService)
Note that changing this executor will affect all httpClients. While not ideal, this change was made because certain ticket registries were persisting the HttpClient and thus getting serializable exceptions.

参数：
executorService - The executor service to send messages to end points.

sendMessageToEndPoint

public boolean sendMessageToEndPoint(String url,
                                     String message,
                                     boolean async)
Sends a message to a particular endpoint. Option of sending it without waiting to ensure a response was returned.

This is useful when it doesn't matter about the response as you'll perform no action based on the response.

指定者：
接口 HttpClient 中的 sendMessageToEndPoint
参数：
url - the url to send the message to
message - the message itself
async - true if you don't want to wait for the response, false otherwise.
返回：
boolean if the message was sent, or async was used. false if the message failed.

isValidEndPoint

public boolean isValidEndPoint(String url)
Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.

指定者：
接口 HttpClient 中的 isValidEndPoint
参数：
url - the url to call
返回：
whether the url is valid

isValidEndPoint

public boolean isValidEndPoint(URL url)
Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.

指定者：
接口 HttpClient 中的 isValidEndPoint
参数：
url - the url to call
返回：
whether the url is valid

setAcceptableCodes

public void setAcceptableCodes(int[] acceptableCodes)
Set the acceptable HTTP status codes that we will use to determine if the response from the URL was correct.

参数：
acceptableCodes - an array of status code integers.

setConnectionTimeout

public void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when opening the endpoint url.

参数：
connectionTimeout - specified timeout value in milliseconds

setReadTimeout

public void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when reading from the endpoint url.

参数：
readTimeout - specified timeout value in milliseconds

setFollowRedirects

public void setFollowRedirects(boolean follow)
Determines the behavior on receiving 3xx responses from HTTP endpoints.

参数：
follow - True to follow 3xx redirects (default), false otherwise.

setSSLSocketFactory

public void setSSLSocketFactory(SSLSocketFactory factory)
Set the SSL socket factory be used by the URL when submitting request to check for URL endpoint validity.

参数：
factory - ssl socket factory instance to use
另请参见：
isValidEndPoint(URL)

setHostnameVerifier

public void setHostnameVerifier(HostnameVerifier verifier)
Set the hostname verifier be used by the URL when submitting request to check for URL endpoint validity.

参数：
verifier - hostname verifier instance to use
另请参见：
isValidEndPoint(URL)

destroy

public void destroy()
             throws Exception
Shutdown the executor service.

指定者：
接口 org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean 中的 destroy
抛出：
Exception - if the executor cannot properly shut down
